entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
